nespoli.dolci.wat

Class CoordMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • nespoli.dolci.wat.CoordMenu

  • public class CoordMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    This activity is used by a the coordinator user and displays the menu of the coordinator and permits to do the basic operation.
